LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.ratty_apparel.desc: The holes in my outfit are annoyingly large. Can't I get something new to wear?
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.tattered_apparel.d: This thing looks like it's about to fall apart. Can't I wear something that doesn't belong in a trash heap?
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted.label: tainted {0}
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted.descripti: I am wearing a piece of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted_1.label: tainted {0} (+1)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted_1.descrip: I am wearing two pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted_2.label: tainted {0} (+2)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted_2.descrip: I am wearing three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted_etc.label: tainted {0} etc
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.tainted_etc.descr: I am wearing four or more pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.chilly.label: chilly
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.cold.label: cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.numbing_cold.desc: I can't stop shivering. My teeth are chattering. All I can think of is getting warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.absolutely_freezi: My teeth are chattering so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.stages.darkness.label: darkness
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.stages.darkness.descript: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.sweaty.label: sweaty
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.sweaty.description: It's too hot here. I'm sweating.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.hot.label: hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.hot.description: It's way too hot here. If I could just have a breath of cool air...
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.sweltering_hot.des: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.blistering_hot.des: This place is searing hot. I think I could die from this heat!
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.human_le: I enjoy wearing the suffering of others.
This will scare them. All will know my power.
The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.
The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.human_leat: Wearing parts of someone's body is... disturbing.
I'm dressed like an insane person.
I think there may be a face on my clothes. Oh no... my clothes *are* a face.
I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm living in a horror show.
LanguageData.LoveReading.stages.I_love_reading.label: I love reading
LanguageData.LoveReading.stages.I_love_reading.descri: Reading really engages my intellectual passions.
LanguageData.LoveReading.stages.I_really_love_reading: Reading excites my burning intellectual passions! I just love learning this way.
LanguageData.Sick.stages.sick.label: sick
LanguageData.SkillBookPassion.stages.interesting_text: This book covers a topic I'm passionate about. It's interesting.
LanguageData.SkillBookPassion.stages.amazing_textbook: This book covers a topic I'm very passionate about. It's captivating.
LanguageData.WrongApparelGender.stages.wearing_appare: I'm wearing apparel that was clearly made for {0}s! This is embarrassing.
